title: Schumer to host AI forum with CEOs including Musk and Zuckerberg
description: Sen. Charles Schumer has said the AI Insight Forums will convene tech experts with different perspectives, “doing years of work in a matter of months.”

title: Meet the people who listen to podcasts 24/7
description: Some people leave podcasts or shows running while they eat, sleep and work. Nonstop listeners say the habit is helpful, but is it bad for our brains?

title: ChatGPT says no political targeting. It’s easy to break the rules.
description: ChatGPT can be used to generate tailored political messages, a capability that could be abused spread tailored disinformation in the 2024 election.
